trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_SEQ_00<tab>The Allagan administrative node's warning lights are flashing.

TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_SEQ_01<tab>The Allagan administrative node informs you that a large number of unidentified dragons have been detected nearby. These creatures pose a severe risk to the native fauna. It asks you to alleviate this risk by slaying four of the things.
TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_SEQ_02<tab>You kill the beasts as instructed by the administrative node. Report your success to the system so that it may reevaluate the situation.

TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_SEQ_03<tab>The administrative node indicates that although you have reduced the dragon population somewhat, their rate of reproduction is too high for this to be a viable long-term solution. The entire population of dragons must be eliminated to prevent further risk to the environment.

TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_MANAGINGSYSTEM_000_000<tab>Warning. Warning. Sensors indicate a large number of unidentified dragons in the immediate vicinity. These creatures present a significant threat to the balance of the local environment. Creatures are designated as Meracydian brobinyaks.
TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_MANAGINGSYSTEM_000_001<tab>All troops of the Allagan Empire, eliminate this threat. Each soldier is to exterminate four Meracydian brobinyaks.
TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_MANAGINGSYSTEM_000_010<tab>The nearby unregistered dragons present an extreme threat to the biodiversity of the local environment. Please destroy four Meracydian brobinyaks.

TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_MANAGINGSYSTEM_000_020<tab><blip> <blip> Elimination of unregistered life-forms confirmed. Verifying population of brobinyaks. <beep> <beep> Brobinyak reproduction rate significantly higher than initially anticipated. Environmental unbalance unavoidable without complete annihilation of dragon population.

TEXT_HEAVNZ926_01991_MANAGINGSYSTEM_000_021<tab>Unregistered life-forms are a direct violation of the Allagan Imperial Environmental Protection Act, the Pets and Domesticated Animals Preservation Statute, the Azys Lla Livestock Control Resolution, the Allagan Ecological Beautification Reform Treaty, the... <buzzzzzz>
